entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36558: .NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #288
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36049: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #287
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36038: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #286
  • .NET November 2023 Updates #285

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance Throwing InvalidOperationException in .NET 8 #94736
  • Test failure - System.NullReferenceException in System.Threading.Lock.TryInitializeStatics #94728
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `Volatile.(Read|Write)Enum` #94727
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36558: .NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #94726
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36049: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #94725
  • c++/cli compile error 3611 if System::IntPtr is used #94723
  • XUnitLogChecker: Enable for NativeAOT tests #94722
  • XUnitLogChecker: Frames are sometimes unresolved #94721
  • XUnitLogChecker: In OSX, no dumps are being found in the /cores directory #94720
  • [Feature Request] Capture app command line information in ELF dumps #94714
    9.0.0
  • [Performance] String.IndexOf(StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) regressed 20% in .NET 8 #94713
  • DateTimeOffset.Now throws exception on Android with Arabic language & western hemisphere timezone #94709
    8.0.x
  • File uploader crashes app on iOS when "use device camera" is used instead of "photo library". #94698
  • [API Proposal]: Expose bound configuration sections (so it is possible to generate a JSON schema for appsettings.json) #94697
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 6 Regressions on 11/12/2023 8:47:21 PM #94724
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 9 Regressions on 11/9/2023 1:06:12 AM #94717
  • Test failure _ParallelCrashTester::ParallelCrashTester.ParallelCrashWorkerThreads() #94687

Closed

  • Reflection fails when working with struct implementing interface that implements inherited static abstract members #94543
  • Brotli no longer allows casting integer as a CompressionLevel (.NET 6 -> .NET 7) #94734
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.NoFuzzyPkcs8 #84601
    Future
  • .NET runtime crashes sometimes during stack unwinding on Linux arm64 #92408
    Future
  • Congratulations on the release of .net 8 #94702
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort not working on linux-musl-arm64 #63187
    Future
  • Update `SystemNative_AlignedAlloc` to properly check `aligned_alloc` availability for Apple targets #54296
    Future
  • [mono] Deadlock on TypeInitializationLock in mono_runtime_class_init_full #93778
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Compare perf for OpenSSL 1.1 vs OpenSSL 3+ MsQuic versions on a same machine #86516
    9.0.0
  • Consider enabling EnforceCodeStyleInBuild in runtime to validate IDE rules on build #94658
  • Add some grouping in output for listing runtimes and sdks #3067
    Future
  • Enable "Hacking Mode" for host #2625
    Future
  • The dotnet host should respect a RID graph from an app's .deps.json #2663
    Future
  • Usability Issues in HttpClient #94471
    9.0.0
  • Add API for detecting broken pipe when write to stdout(or stderr) #30540
    Future
  • Setting Console.CursorVisible property does not change visibility in Linux #31063
    Future
  • Console issues with multithreaded c# app only when run on Linux #49301
    Future
  • Proposal: Make Console.Input/OutputEncoding default to UTF-16 on Windows #70168
    Future
  • Console.Write(<character>) behaves differently depending on which terminal (and said terminal's settings) is being used. #76825
    Future
  • Test failure ConsoleEncoding.TestEncoding #85772
    Future
  • How can i get the filed "m_length" of "ILGenerator" ? #94662
  • Enable Type equivalence caching for collectible types #11577
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi] Run the mono runtime component selection logic for wasi #94738
    area-Build-mono
  • Add etw event for Monitor.Wait #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow spmi collection of altjit compiles #94733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ConstructorBuilder implementation, integrate TypeBuilder.GetXyz() static methods #94732
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #94731
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #94730
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #94729
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0-staging] [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94719
    Servicing-consider, os-android, area-System.DateTime
  • [release/8.0-staging] [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94718
    Servicing-consider, os-android, area-System.DateTime
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update APICompat baseline version to 8.0.0 #94716
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] #ifdef out code that requires FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #94715
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Implement emulate single step feature. #94711
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94710
    os-android, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94708
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94707
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94706
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 6.0.x
  • [NO MERGE][mono] imt vt_slot robustness #94705
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Optimize data flow used in assertion prop/CSE #94701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extract common CodeAnalysis rules into separate file #94696
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94693
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: enable cross-block local assertion prop #94689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Improve message when wasi-sdk is missing #94688
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Make Deflate/GZip/ZlibStream empty writes have the same impact as no writes #94433
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add missing readonly modifiers to GCHandle and DependentHandle #93178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Revert performance optimization resulting in incorrect lookups in certain case insensitive frozen collections #94685
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.x
  • Update APICompat baseline version to 8.0.0 #94712
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add document listing supported feature checks #94440
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: consistently handle no return calls in qmarks #94690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to unbreak nativeaot outerloop legs #94692
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mention "native" instruction set in the docs #94695
    documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Filter out a few more phi args in VN #94699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle null signature destinations for ECDsa / DSA / RSA #93996
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Emit exception blocks for the new ILGenerator #94366
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [wasm] Enable WasmStripILAfterAOT by default #94682
    area-Build-mono
  • add IO.Ports packaging for linux-musl #92145
    area-System.IO.Ports
  • Enable aligned_alloc on macOS #94298
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-ios
  • [release/7.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94573
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • Expose ChannelReader.ReadAllAsync from non-core builds as well #94417
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • Delete .editorconfig for AOT projects #94694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #94492
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Updated

  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono-debug] refactor access to MonoDebugInformationEnc #94617
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • try regMask to unsigned __int128 for linux/arm64 #94589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Calculate PackageVersionNet7 #94614
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Merge CodeGenBringUpTests projects #94122
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add feature switch attribute design doc #94625
    linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Arm64/SVE: Add Uzp1 #94529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm64-sve
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Format usings to match code style #94085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Clean up NYI_RISCV64 in CodeGen and Emitter #94666
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/6.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94577
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94649
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Optimize SSA #94672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add support for specifying "experiment name". #94679
    tenet-performance-benchmarks, area-Infrastructure
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion #94613
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Introduce VectorXXX.GetMatchCount and VectorXXX.IndexOfFirstMatch helper methods to ensure optimal codegen for ARM64 and unrolled fallback paths #94472
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8: New hash added to product version, can't find a workaround or find info about this change #36885
  • 8.0.100 SDK installed by `dotnet-install.sh` contains rc2 files #36884
  • Can't install mobile-librarybuilder workload for NativeAOT #36872
  • Broken installation after reboot #36871
    Discussion
  • On New jenkins build server ,dotnet core(6.0) build is referring following dll microsoft.extensions.dependency.model.dll to older version 2.1.0 instead of 3.0.19.* #36866

Closed

  • Upgrading to 8.0.0-rc.2.9511 breaks the app. Loses references to MauiUIApplicationDelegate #36667
  • Publishing self-contained solution yields wrong system binaries in some environments #20450
  • Global tool installation should not use local NuGet.config #20396
  • Add dependency on Microsoft.Deployment.DotNet.Releases and add darc subscirption #20262
  • msbuild / dotnet build does not pass the property generated by nuget packagereference's GeneratePathProperty #20160
  • `ApplicationManifest` is not respected when building for Windows on Linux #23627

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #36892
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #36891
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #36890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #36889
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #36888
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #36887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #36882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the RTM release build #36870
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the default for 'EnforceCodeStyleInBuild' to true with AnalysisLevel 9.0 or greater #36853
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create dummy AfterSdkPublish target Fixes #26710 #36850
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #36880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #36879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #36878
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #36877
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #36876
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #36875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix possible NullReferenceException due to &/&& typo #35026
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Update manpages for 8.0 #36447
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.1
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • update editorconfig template #36642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix loc mirror branch #36869
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Updated

  • Freeze Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver assembly version #36733
    untriaged
  • Parse -d command differently based on position #35492
    Servicing-consider, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36804
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • (for discussion only) Add support for `DOTNET_WATCH_AUTO_RELOAD_WS_ENDPOINT` to `dotnet watch` #31575

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Type inference using method group natural type #7687
  • Open issue: evaluation of implicit indexers in object initializers #7684

PullRequests

Merged

  • Create params-collections.md proposal #7661
  • Queue topic for implicit indexers #7685

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Decouple tracking of synthesized top-level types from `PrivateImplementationDetails` class #70812
  • MSBuildProjectShouldHandleCodePageProperty fails locally #70809
  • Type inferer doesn't work for argument of base record primary constructor #70803
  • ctor shortcut access modifier #70800
  • Completion UI not called when typed char is a number #70798
  • Internal error in the C# compiler in evaluation when pattern variables are used #70796

Closed

  • AnalyzeDataFlow reports captured primary ctor parameters in lambdas that do not capture any #69152
    Compiler.Next
  • Deeply recursive documents cause AbstractReplaceConditionalWithStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider.TryFindConditional to blow the stack #70797
  • `using static` statement does not work with C# 12's new `alias any type` feature #70805
  • Params arrays should be created during binding #49602
    17.9
  • IDE0251 incorrectly reported when using primary constructors #70780
  • Deeply recursive documents cause AbstractSyntaxHelper.ContainsAttributeList to blow the stack #70790
    17.9 P2
  • Workspace failed with could not load "NuGet.Frameworks" error #61454

PullRequests

Created

  • The SyntaxWalker API doesn't handle deeply nested syntax nodes well. #70811
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix captured variables analysis #70810
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 (copy runtime logic) #70808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update sdk to 8.0.100 #70807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Suggest installing exact matching .NET SDK in global.json #70806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to using SelectManyAsArray #70802
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Thread in a new MSBuild property `EffectiveAnalysisLevelStyle` to IDE code style analyzers #70794
    Area-Analyzers, IDE-CodeStyle, untriaged

Merged

  • Only show argument completion items when method accepts arguments #70789
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update doc of `DataFlowAnalysis.Captured` #70795
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #70804
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fixup an internal compiler iterator to be a struct iterator #70799
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Modify AbstractReplaceConditionalWithStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider.TryFindConditional to not use recursion #70801
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix VB intellisense integration test #70756
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Create params arrays during binding #70762
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Perform less cross process calls when computing 'Nav To' results. #70788
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'make member readonly' with mutation of primary constructor parameters #70781
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove recursion in ForAttributeWithMetadataName #70791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 #70723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Handle satellite assembly loading in .NET Core #70769
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • 67328 - Update the casing of remove unecessary usings in lightbulb menu #70675
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix for source generator diagnostics not showing up as part of live analysis when generators run in OOP #70715
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Nullable compound assignment experiment #70751
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pascal and camel case should not allow underscores -- unless "_" is set as word_separator #70506
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Make eng/build.sh --test run more unit tests #70793
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [.NET 8] ASP.NET Core Web API Server is Not Accessible in Docker #52059
  • Blazor -- Breakpoints not hit for event handler defined using @bind-Value:after="FunctionName" until after await is called #52054
  • [Blazor .NET 8] Missing rendermode Symbol in Default Interactivity Auto Template #52051
  • Visual Studio 17.8 (Angular and ASP.NET Core Template fails on creation #52049
  • Cannot resolve symbol 'RenderModeInteractiveServer' #52048
  • [Announcement] ASP.NET Core in .NET 8 is now available! #52046
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36038: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #52043
  • Using @ref with inheritance in Blazor doesn't work #52039
  • Cannot render component from RazorClassLibrary with RenderMode.InteractiveWebAssembly or Auto in Blazor 8 #52037
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #52036
  • Kestrel HTTP/2 Timeout Behavior in Debugging Sessions is Problematic #52031

Closed

  • Update TFM to net9.0 #50662
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Canceled request to .NET 8 RC 1 running on IIS InProcess hosting model causes ThreadPool Starvation #51121
  • In Blazor WebApp with auto render mode, how to resolve the pages or routeData from wasm? #51518
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Announcement] Preparing for the 8.0 release #50091
  • DisableAntiforgery Doesn't work on Route Groups #52033
  • Duplicate Route Name #52008
  • Perf improvement: https #52027
  • Perf regression: plaintext #52028
  • Blazor-server-side Multi routing such as in mvc #37485
    Planning: WebUI
  • Prevent onkeydown event with condition. #48113
    Planning: WebUI
  • InputSelectEnum #34823
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent delivery of events to disposed components #52057
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #52045
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Fixed HostFilteringMiddleware. Added HostFilteringMiddleware.MiddlewareConfigurationManager #52038
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with switch #52035
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with action replacement #52034
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #52055
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Fix canceled requests in IIS #52056
    area-infrastructure, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #52047
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • Update baselines, SiteExtensions for 8.0 RTM #52050
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Use working directory as relative directory for project file resolution #51974
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-commandlinetools, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Avoid requiring ProblemDetailsService when IExceptionHandler is used #51898
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • Optimize HTTP method lookup in routing jumptable #51803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, area-ui-rendering
  • [DO NOT MERGE PLEASE] Validate install-scripts changes #51889
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-counters does not produce metrics when GC was running? #4395

Closed

  • `timestamp` for `dotnet counters` in JSON Formatted Incorrectly #3905
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Universal Time formatting #4389

Updated

  • Make DiagnosticsClient.StartEventPipeSessionAsync public #4394

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MacCatalyst project fails to build with clang++ error after migrating to .NET 8 #18741
  • [testing] Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18740
    .NET 8 SR1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: Migrate existing Data in Json Columns the right way with EF8 Core #32301
  • add-migration better error log #32294
  • Move issues from 9.0.0 preview milestones to 9.0.0 after GA #32293
    9.0.0
  • Regression with translation of `Contains` for SqlServer #32291
  • Unexpected Additional Foreign Key Generation in Migration When Using `IEntityTypeConfiguration` #32290

Closed

  • Compiled model with parameterized value converters #32280
  • Add ModelBuilderTestBase implementation that uses IConventionBuilder* #25039
  • ToSchema() extension #32286
  • Move issues from 8.0.0 preview milestones to 8.0.0 after GA #29016
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32300
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32299
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Adjust test class names and namespaces #32289

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #32295
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #32297
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #32296
  • Update to .NET 8 GA #32298
    auto-merge
  • Make ModelBuilderTest asserts more robust and extensible #32221
    providers-beware
  • Add more tests for ConventionSet and fix the found issues. #32220
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32235 - Buffering error in JSON deserialization with junk data #32253
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Stop throwing for complex type properties when sensitive data logging is on #32285
    Servicing-approved
  • Remove quirks #32292
  • Improve some exception messages. #32260

Updated

  • Fix lock loosing in concurrency detector for multiple contexts on one thread #31891
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
    waiting-for-response
